reviews.review: Jogo bom, nostalgico, mas compre na promo.

Para mi counter strike 1.6 es uno de los mejores fps de videojuegos lanzado en 1999 y es uno de los juegos mas jugado y queridos por los jugadores y lo que mas destaca es su enorme accesibilidad y es facil controlarlo aunque jugar bn exige entrenamiento...

This game introduced me to Online Gaming ;-;....it is just nostaligacally awesome even after a decade of its release kept barely alive by its never dieing community of veterans and a few new players. My actual hours on this game is more than 1500hrs as the first 1000+ were on a Non-Steam version, so the official count is just this much :x

If you are into fps you can't miss this "game". It is far more than just a game.

For "old school" gamer like myself it's the game of a generation.

Better than any other counter-strike after.

The art style is beautiful.

Go for it if you don't have it and find a good server to play regularly.

El counter strike en si es un juegazo,lo malo es que tenerlo steam trae mas problemas que tenerlo pirata,yo lo jugue 1 hora en steam y no me gusta jaja,no puedo ajustar la resolucion de pantalla como a mi me gustaria,y si jugas a los servers recomendados que salen en "internet" te puede infectar el cs con virus y aunque lo desinstales va a seguir estando y molestando.Asi que lo voy a recomendar por el titulo,pero en mi opinion es mejor Counter Strike No Steam
